Performance:
October 1991: The Vendetta in Iga

Production: October 1991

Play: The Vendetta in Iga (伊賀越道中双六)

Scenes:

The Town of Numazu (沼津 / Numazu)

Characters:

Shibagaki (Haha Shibagaki / 母柴垣)

Otani (Musume Otani / 娘お谷)

Matagoro (Sawai Matagorō / 沢井股五郎)

Yukie (Wada Yukie / 和田行家)

Jitsunai (Yakko Jitsunai / 奴実内)

Dainaiki (Konda Dainaiki / 誉田大内記)

Goemon (Usami Goemon / 宇佐見五右衛門)

Rinzaemon (Sakurada Rinzaemon / 桜田林左衛門)

Busuke (Ishitome Busuke / 石留武助)

Masaemon (Karaki Masaemon / 唐木政右衛門)

Okura (Uba Okura / 乳母おくら)

Onochi (Musume Onochi / 娘おのち)

Page (Koshō / 小姓)

Heisaku (Oya Heisaku / 親平作 (雲助平作))

Jubei (Gofukuya Jūbei / 呉服屋十兵衛 (重兵衛))

Yasubei (Nimochi Yasubei / 荷持安兵衛)

Oyone (Musume Oyone / 娘お米)

Magohachi (Ikezoe Magohachi / 池添孫八)

Shizuma (Wada Shizuma / 和田志津馬)

Osode (Musume Osode / 娘お袖)

Sukehei (Yakko Sukehei / 奴助平)

Gampachi (Janome no Ganpachi / 蛇の目の眼八)

Kobei's wife (Kōbei nyōbō / 幸兵衛女房)

Kobei (Yamada Kōbei / 山田幸兵衛)

Chief constable (Torite no kogashira / 捕手の小頭)

Messanger Kosuke (Aruki no Kosuke / 歩きの小助)

Minosuke, Otani's son (Segare Minosuke / 伜巳之助)

Night watchman (Yomawari / 夜回り)

Segawa (Keisei Segawa / 傾城瀬川)

Postman (Hikyaku / 飛脚)

Tsurutayu (Manzai Tsurutayū / 万歳鶴太夫)

Kamekichi (Saizō Kamekichi / 才造亀吉)

Sadashichi (Honshōya Sadashichi / 本庄屋定七)

Magoroku (Ikezoe Magoroku / 池添孫六)

Kinezo, a dumpling peddler (Dangouri Kinezō / 団子売杵造)

Ousu, a dumpling peddler (Dangouri Ousu / 団子売お臼)

Tanemon Sasaki (Sasaki Tanemon / 佐々木丹右衛門)

Jogoro Sawai (Sawai Jōgorō / 沢井城五郎)

Narumi (Haha Narumi / 母鳴海)

Nomorinosuke Kondo (Kondō Nomorinosuke / 近藤野守之助)

A vassal of the Shogun (Jikkin zamurai / 眤近侍)

Omatsu, a maid (Koshimoto Omatsu / 腰元お松)

Onaka, a maid (Koshimoto Onaka / 腰元お中)

Seki, a vassal of the Shogun (Jikkin zamurai Seki / 眤近侍関)

Umida, a vassal of the Shogun (Jikkin zamurai Kaita (Kaiden) / 眤近侍海田)

Arakawa, a vassal of the Shogun (Jikkin zamurai Arakawa / 眤近侍荒川)

Constables (Torite / 捕手)
